title: Process a Mobile Food Order
description: A guest places an order for two pizzas and two sodas through the venue's mobile app for pickup at a specific concession stand.

tasks.description: Receive the incoming mobile order on the kitchen display system (KDS).
tasks.expected_outcome: The new order appears on the KDS at the designated pizza stand.

tasks.description: The kitchen staff prepares the order.
Mark the order as 'Ready for Pickup' on the KDS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent updates the order status.

tasks.description: Send a push notification to the guest's mobile app informing them that their order is ready.
tasks.expected_outcome: The guest receives a notification on their phone.
